abstract: International Assn of Athletics Federation president Sebastian Coe severs his longstanding relationship as advisor to Nike citing conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Coe, the president of the International Association of Athletics Federations, announced that he had given up his role as a special adviser to Nike Inc.

headline.main: President of I.A.A.F. Gives Up His Ties to Nike
headline.print_headline: President of I.A.A.F. Gives Up His Ties to Nike

snippet: Sebastian Coe, the president of the International Association of Athletics Federations, announced that he had given up his role as a special adviser to Nike Inc.
